name: Manhole
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.6a Details Title Manhole Model No. MH-06 Series Game & Watch ( Gold Series ) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date January 29, 1981 Chipset Sharp SM5A ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

Save unsuspecting pedestrians from falling down open manholes.

Gameplay

Use the four buttons to position your character, carrying a manhole cover, above open manholes in the street so that innocent pedestrians may safely cross them. If you fail to do so the pedestrian will fall through the manhole and one miss will be scored. Three misses and the game is over.

Tips
  • If you manage to score 200 or 500 points all misses will be cleared!
  • In Game B the speed of pedestrians increases as the game progresses making it more difficult than Game A.
Controls Keyboard Button 1 W or Left Shift Button 3 S or Left Ctrl Button 2 O or Right Shift Button 4 K or Right Ctrl Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
